name: Topdown 2
description:
A short Zombie game, where you traverse a forest finding new randomly generated guns to fight the horde of zombies that's following you.

The game is far from finished but you can get some cool guns and shoot some zombies.

This project was made as a assignment in collage.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse 1 - Shooting

Q - Switch Weapons

Z - Drop Weapons

R - Reload

Shift - Run

CTRL - Sneak

E - Interact / Pick Up
